job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
- 5+ years designing software and coding professionally   
  - Computer Science degree preferred   
  - An interest in the blockchain and cryptocurrency space   
  - Proficient with Java   
  - Proficient with a scripting language such as Python, Nodejs and/or PHP   
  - Comfortable and proficient in a Linux terminal is required   
  - Experience building and testing microservices with REST, preferably in Java   
  - Capable of taking a new feature from the software design stage, through the development process, and ship it to production   
  - Broad knowledge of SQL and relational database design   
  - Some knowledge of the mechanics of applied cryptography including hashing, randomization, public-key encryption, symmetric encryption, and elliptic curves
